General.Name: Baoding Heavy Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of various forgings and castings in China. It offers casting and forging for ships, as well as for mining machinery, electric power engineering, technology, and hoisting machinery. The company's products are primarily used in shipbuilding, ocean engineering, power-station, petro-chemical, engineering machinery, pressure vessels, military, etc. It also exports its products to Germany, Lowey, France, Finland, Canada, Singapore, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Baoding Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2016. Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: China Town Industrial Park, Hangzhou, China
